alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 9:10PM CDT until March 16 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Travis County in south central Texas... Central Bastrop County in south central Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 910 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Austin, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Austin, Pflugerville, Elgin, Bastrop, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Windemere, Manor, West Lake Hills, Rollingwood, Barton Creek, Camp Swift, Wyldwood, Cedar Creek, Circle D-KC Estates, Hornsby Bend, Sunset Valley, Webberville, Phelan, Garfield and Wells Branch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
